rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment discusses future production ('will produce'), which is excluded by the Q3 table.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports production projections but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes production projections, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports production projections ('up to 14.9 million tons', 'up to 15.35 million tons') and time period ('end of this year', '2024') using standard verbs.
